response.overview: Ek Dulara is a 2008 drama starring Raghava Lawrence, Sneha, Namitha, Nassar, Saranya Ponvannan and others. Pandi does menial jobs in Dubai and saves every penny to send it to his family in India. But days before Pandi's sister's wedding, Sriman runs away from the house with the money. Pandi helps his family. He loves Sneha from his village. Sneha leaves home to marry Pandi. When he returns from Dubai, Pandi finds that his mother is dead. Who killed her and why?
response.title: Ek Dulara
